name: Block Puzzle Jewel - Jewels Star Ultimate
name_original: Block Puzzle Jewel - Jewels Star Ultimate
description:
Block Puzzle Jewel is a super innovative yet very shiny and addictive!
The game’s rule is very simple: drag these shiny jewels to the space in order to destroy the existed lines in both horizontally or vertically, but be careful because of letting no space available meaning the game will come to and end!

Download now and venture to make your brain faster and more focus. Try to get the best score to see who you are in the world!
